title: Nodame Cantabile Paris
alternative_title: のだめカンタービレ 巴里編
description: Having been given the opportunity to study at Paris, Noda accompanies Chiaki to Europe as he strives to become the accomplished conductor he always dreamt to be.
genre: [<Genre -> Comedy>, <Genre -> Josei>, <Genre -> Music>, <Genre -> Romance>, <Genre -> Slice of Life>]
